Text: When i install i get this... any solutions? "The upgrade patch cannot be installed by the Windows Installer service because the program to be upgraded may be missing or the upgrade patch may update a different version of the program. Verify that the program to be upgraded exists on your computer and that you have the correct upgrade patch."
With this update patch the freezing ended for me. Now it works as it should. Thanks SKIDROW and thanks scene4all
This patch won't fix crashes. Kalypso is working on this issue already so wait for another one unless you don't mind losing progress in the game due to random crash.
how do you use the freakin keygen cause its only class files, no exe
It doesn't crash as often as it used to. Still crashes though quite regularly and as said Kalypso is working on a fix.
for use the keygen you have to go into the java bin folder with command prompt and execute "java -jar c:...PortRoyale3Keygen.jar"
Been playing for 4 hours straight and I've experienced not one single crash.

Yeah no CTD for me to.!I did not test the game without the patch but for the time i have played it looks very stable and btw better than the previous games..So my good friend @scene4all awesome job with this update/crack and much oblige mate.Cheers.:-)
